mutants.code:
def reverse_list(lst):
    start = 1
    end = len(lst) - 1
    while start < end:
        (lst[start], lst[end]) = (lst[end], lst[start])
        start += 1
        end -= 1
    return lst

def reverse_list(lst):
    start = -1
    end = len(lst) - 1
    while start < end:
        (lst[start], lst[end]) = (lst[end], lst[start])
        start += 1
        end -= 1
    return lst
